headline: Bloom Energy’s Big Utility And AI Deals Test Rich Valuation And Execution
summary: Bloom Energy (NYSE:BE) announced a $2.65b fuel cell sale to American Electric Power alongside a 20 year offtake agreement. The company also revealed a $5b partnership with Brookfield Asset Management to supply power for AI data centers. These agreements significantly expand Bloom Energy’s presence in utility scale generation and AI focused data center power.
